name: Bartender - The Perfect Cocktail
description:
- New game with Sprite Kit, new engine of iOS 7.

- Allow you see 15 popular cocktails over the world from Blue Lagoon, Irish Coffee, Blood Mary, ... and know that elements in these cocktails.

- Information about cocktail:
+ What glass you need to use for each cocktail
+ Exactly elements in each cocktail

+ Bonus: A match-3 game using cocktail for you to have fun.
